topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec68663687252dbdc2900#post_54dec68663687252dbdc2900
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54dec57e63687214e6be0900#post_54dec57e63687214e6be0900
The only thing I know about this, is that a lot of people tends to get mad at the simple mention of this character.[/bq]
Spoiler below:
[spoiler]Short version is Shou Tucker from Fullmetal Alchemist is a state worker that does alchemy.  The reason why everyone hates him is that he's at first a nice single dad after his wife leaves him because he was failing as a alchemist, but then later on he manages to make a hybrid animal chimera that can talk; for several episodes see him trying to to do his best to make another animal that can talk while raising his daughter; finally right before he loses his license, his house, his job, he sends his daughter to stay with her mom for a while worrying about him losing everything then he manages to create another talking animal; however the thing is that his wife left right before he made the first one and his daughter left right before the second one and the protagonist realizes that the way he created those talking animals was he fused his wife with a dog and then fused his daughter with a dog.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
